plot: Two young men are trapped in a vicious cycle of unfulfilling days and reckless nights. As each strives to find their identity, they battle immature habits and their own deteriorating friendship.
title: Restrained
plot_es: Two young men are trapped in a vicious cycle of unfulfilling days and reckless nights. As each strives to find their identity, they battle immature habits and their own deteriorating friendship.
plot_en: Two young men are trapped in a vicious cycle of unfulfilling days and reckless nights. As each strives to find their identity, they battle immature habits and their own deteriorating friendship.
